content: Hi @Sean McIlvenna , is the server down? It seems I cannot log in with my existing credentials. Thanks in advance for any help.
Over the weekend the SSL certificates on the server expired. We updated them on the servers, so we thought, but they werenâ€™t working quite right. This should be fixed now.

Thanks @Sean McIlvenna .

A quick question around renaming profile ID in Trifolia. I renamed the ID of the R4 Coverage profile from "carin-bb-Coverage" to "CARIN-BB-Coverage" to conform to an existing ID pattern. I made sure that the profile wasn't referenced by the carin-bb IG and it seems the rename completed without any error. However now I can't seem to find that profile using the new or the old ID. Also, when I try to recreate the profile (same new ID) using Import, I get a server error. Any idea what may be going on? @Pat Taylor

@Sean McIlvenna trifolia-fhir-dev.lantanagroup.com/lantana_prod_hapi_r4 seems to be down in the last 2-3 hours. It asks to reenter my family and given name, but when I do, it hangs for a while and then returns a 502 Bad Gateway error.
ok, I'll check it out... a good chance the HAPI FHIR server has hung up, or something like that
that seems to happen when the HAPI FHIR server becomes unresponsive
yes, that appears to be the case
